_meta.description: Representative sample of Strong's Hebrew definitions (H0001-H8674)

H0001.def: father, in a literal and immediate, or figurative and remote application

H0003.def: greenness, i.e. a young ear of grain; hence, the name of the month Abib or Nisan

H0006.def: properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)

H0009.def: concrete, something lost; abstract, destruction, i.e. Hades

H0120.def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)

H0136.def: the Lord (used as a proper name of God only)

H0430.def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God

H0776.def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
H0776.derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm

H0802.def: a woman (used in the same wide sense as H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ))

H1121.def: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship)

H1285.def: a compact (because made by passing between pieces of flesh)
H1285.derivation: from H1262 (בָּרָה) (in the sense of cutting)

H1288.def: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit)

H1697.def: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing

H1732.def: David, the youngest son of Jesse

H2088.def: the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that

H2421.def: to live, whether literally or figuratively; causatively, to revive

H2617.def: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty

H3068.def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

H3117.def: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term)
H3117.derivation: from an unused root meaning to be hot

H3478.def: Israel, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity

H3605.def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

H3820.def: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect

H4325.def: water; figuratively, juice; by euphemism, urine, semen

H4397.def: a messenger; specifically, of God, i.e. an angel (also a prophet, priest or teacher)
H4397.derivation: from an unused root meaning to despatch as a deputy

H5315.def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)

H5414.def: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)

H5439.def: (as noun) a circle, neighbour, or environs; but chiefly (as adverb, with or without preposition) around

H5769.def: properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity

H5892.def: a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)

H6213.def: to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application

H6440.def: the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively)

H6635.def: a mass of persons (or figuratively, things), especially reg. organized for war (an army)

H6666.def: rightness (abstractly), subjectively (rectitude), objectively (justice), morally (virtue) or figuratively (prosperity)

H6944.def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity

H7121.def: to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)

H7200.def: to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications)

H7225.def: the first, in place, time, order or rank (specifically, a firstfruit)

H7307.def: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality

H7451.def: bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)

H7725.def: to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively

H7760.def: to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)

H7965.def: safe, i.e. (figuratively) well, happy, friendly; also (abstractly) welfare, i.e. health, prosperity, peace

H8034.def: an appellation, as a mark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character

H8064.def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)

H8085.def: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.)

H8104.def: properly, to hedge about (as with thorns), i.e. guard; generally, to protect, attend to

H8141.def: a year (as a revolution of time)

H8199.def: to judge, i.e. pronounce sentence (for or against); by implication, to vindicate or punish

H8451.def: a precept or statute, especially the Decalogue or Pentateuch

H0376.def: a man as an individual or a male person

H0582.def: a mortal (and thus differing from the more dignified H120 (אָדָם))

H1004.def: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)

H1696.def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak

H1961.def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)

H2896.def: good (as an adjective) in the widest sense

H3027.def: a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.))

H3045.def: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing)

H3318.def: to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications

H4191.def: to die (literally or figuratively); causatively, to kill

H5157.def: to inherit (as a (figurative) mode of descent), or (generally) to occupy

H5186.def: to stretch or spread out; by implication, to bend away (including moral deflection)

H5375.def: to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absol. and rel.

H5564.def: to prop (literally or figuratively); reflexively, to lean upon or take hold of

H5971.def: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants

H6031.def: to depress literally or figuratively, transitive or intransitive (in various applications)

H6485.def: to visit (with friendly or hostile intent); by analogy, to oversee, muster, charge, care for, miss, deposit

H6664.def: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity

H6965.def: to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)

H7227.def: abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)

H7563.def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person

H7704.derivation: from an unused root meaning to spread out

H7812.def: to depress, i.e. prostrate (especially reflexive, in homage to royalty or God)

H8179.def: an opening, i.e. door or gate
H8179.derivation: from H8176 (שָׁעַר) in its original sense

H8432.def: a bisection, i.e. (by implication) the centre
H8432.derivation: from an unused root meaning to sever

H8478.def: the bottom (as depressed); only adverbially, below (often with prepositional prefix underneath)
